title: I/O datasize vs overhead (small files)
description: Scatter plot showing tracing overhead (%) for small files across varying total data volumes. Overhead patterns vary significantly by workload characteristics and syscall density.

title: I/O datasize vs overhead (medium files)
description: Scatter plot showing tracing overhead (%) for medium files across varying total data volumes. Overhead patterns vary significantly by workload characteristics and syscall density.

title: I/O datasize vs overhead (large files)
description: Scatter plot showing tracing overhead (%) for large files across varying total data volumes. Overhead patterns vary significantly by workload characteristics and syscall density.

title: CPU-only tracing vs runtime
description: Log–log scatter with fit and 1/x reference. Demonstrates pure amortization—fixed tracing startup cost (~constant) divided by increasing CPU runtime. Expected slope ≈ −1 in log-log space.
